name: SACH KHAND SEWA SAMITI DUNGARIYA
briefDescription: Sachkhand Sewa Samiti Dungariya is social development organization, dedicated for the development of the poor and marginalized community founded in 2007 and registered under society registration act Madhya Pradesh and a mission-driven organization with several achievements to its credit. Founded in 2007, organization is assiduously working in core areas – education, women empowerment, health, livelihood promotion, skill development, natural resource management, children development programme, training, human resource development and promotion of rural, urban community development and social research and development – to bring about positive changes in the lives of rural and tribal disadvantaged communities.
